products.title: Bermuda Plain Primary Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Available in a range of sunny colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. Bermuda is also available in their panel and vertical ranges. This blue roller blind is perfect to create a cosy feel in your home and will add a splash of colour to the room of your choice. Product id: db-rbx1397 fabric colour: primary blue material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes bermuda plain primary blue roller blind in blue.
